body.name: Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic Newborn Baby Bottle Feeding Gift Set, Heat Sensing Technology, Breast-like Nipple, BPA-Free
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 36 mins
features: Baby bottle designed to reduce colic symptoms for less gas, spit up and discomfort
Award-winning breast-like nipple for natural latch and guaranteed acceptance
Unique anti-colic venting system draws air away from milk
Heat sensing technology turns straw pink when baby's feed is too hot
The ideal feeding bottle for breastfed babies: this set is perfect for a baby shower!
BPA free and phthalate-free for ultimate reassurance
body.description: This is no ordinary bottle. Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottles work a little differently from regular bottles to help combat colic while ensuring a comfortable feeding experience for you and your baby. The unique 3-piece anti-colic venting system draws air away from milk and the star valve keeps milk from traveling up the tube, meaning less gas, reflux and discomfort 84% of moms who used our Anti-Colic bottles agreed they reduced their baby's colic symptoms.* Plus, the anti-colic venting tube comes with a built-in heat sensing strip that gives you extra reassurance that the milk is a safe temperature for baby. Loved by moms and babies, our easy latch-on, breast-like nipple feels closer to skin and mimics the natural flex and movement of a mom's breast for a comfortable feeding. 95% of moms reported that their baby accepted the super soft silicone nipple with skin-like feel and would recommend to others.*Easy to clean and suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and steam sterilizers. 100% BPA-free for complete peace of mind.We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow for 0+ months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Advanced Anti-Colic nipples are only compatible with Advanced Anti-Colic bottles. We recommend changing your bottle nipples every two months. And you should change them immediately if they're damaged or weak.The Closer to Nature Travel Baby Bottle and Food Warmer doesn't require electricity and is a convenient and fuss-free way to heat baby bottles and baby food on the go. It heats everything from breast milk or formula to baby food in jars or pouches. Its compact enough to fit in your baby's changing bag so you're able to heat feeds anywhere, anytime.* Based on 2021 study of 524 parents who use Tommee Tippee bottles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Triple-vented anti-colic wand. Made up of only three parts, the anti-colic wand in the baby bottle keeps air away from milk, meaning fewer colic symptoms in 95% of babies**. Naturally anti-colic. Our Advanced Anti-Colic bottle works a little differently from regular bottles to help combat colic while ensuring a comfortable feeding experience for you and your baby. Breast-like nipple. Our bottle nipples are made from soft silicone and have a special breast-like shape that helps baby latch and reduces air intake, meaning less discomfort of colic, gas and reflux.

Most recommended baby bottle. Our Closer to Nature Anti-Colic bottles are #1 for easily switching between bottle and breast* 100% leakproof. When the screw ring, nipple and cap are all secured, your baby bottle is completely mess-free and leakproof, even if it’s turned upside down or shaken. Heat-sensing technology. The anti-colic venting tube comes with a built-in heat sensing gives you extra reassurance when feeding baby as the strip will turn pink when baby’s milk is too hot.

Easy clean and BPA free. These bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and sterilizers. All Tommee Tippee bottles are BPA- and phthalate-free for your ultimate reassurance. Go with the flow. We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Change me. Our nipples are silky soft. Change them if they get damaged or bitten by tiny teeth. Advanced Anti-Colic baby bottles are ONLY compatible with Advanced Anti-Colic nipples and cannot be used with advanced Closer to Nature bottle nipples.

Closer to Nature Closure to Nature Glass Closer to Nature Silicone Advanced Anti-Colic Bottle material: Plastic Borosilicate glass Silicone Plastic Breast-like teat for a natural latch ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Teat flexes like mum for a comfortable feed ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-colic valve in teat ✓ ✓ ✓ Unique anti-colic straw draws air away from milk ✓ Sizes available: 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce, 11 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce Replacement teats available: Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Added Cereal Flow Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this same set as a baby shower gift then ordered it for someone else because we loved it so much the little formula containers are so convenient as well as the water container. It comes with everything we needed to get started for our first baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent starter pack and shipped fast!
reviews.reviewText: Great starter pack for newborn babies, anti colic, comes with everything you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good buy for sure the bottles work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: New mom received and said it was perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Convenience: A Must-Have Baby Bottle Set with Portable Warmer and More!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got my hands on this fantastic baby bottle set, and it's been a game-changer for our feeding routine. The portable bottle warmer is a lifesaver for on-the-go meals, heating up bottles quickly and evenly. The included scrub brush makes cleanup easier. The bottles do have multiple parts to clean so that is kind of a draw back. However , it doesn't take away from the effectiveness of the bottle itself. Plus, the pacifiers have been a hit with my little one, offering comfort when it is most needed. It's the all-in-one solution that I didn't know I needed, but now can't live without!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bottle ever
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are awesome. The anti colic is perfect. No leaks. Great nipple for my baby! He would still breastfeed AND stake this bottle. Never caused any latching issues. Now we do formula and he loves the bottle still. I love the ability to size up slowly for the nipples. My baby has severe reflux and had bad gas and colic for a while, and these really did the job on minimizing it all. Highly recommend these bottles! The ONLY flaw is how wide they are and they don’t fit in my insulated bottle pockets in my diaper bag, but that’s how you get the breast like design at the top so we just store our milk in separate thinner bottles with caps, and pour them into these bottles when ready to feed.
Muy buena calidad y muy útil el termo, así como los demás aditamentos. Lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for gift for friends and family with child
reviews.reviewText: Good value for money, complete set
VALE LA PENA INCLUYE TODO LO MENSIONADO BIENE BIEN CUIDADO Y ME LLEGO SUPER RAPIDO !!! GRACIAS ..

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value and huge improvement of colic.
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with my purchase, my baby latches so well on these bottles and the anticolic system does a great job of removing air from her milk. I wish these bottles adapted to their original standard bottle nipples and collar, but understand why that wouldn’t work. Baby also wasn’t a fan of the pacifiers.Still, overall, baby and I are very happy with the purchase. On sale for $43 so I just bought another set. 😋
